title: Client screen getting stuck in champ select (ranked) and not allowing me to pick therefore dodging.
body:
I was in ranked champ select and it got stuck on their summoner 4 banning and I was first pick. Summoner 4 was stuck on 0 seconds, after about 30 seconds I get kicked for not picking a champion and locking in. Even though on my client it never allowed me to pick someone and their summoner 4 was still banning at 0 seconds. This is the second time its happened to me this week -.- every time it happens thats -3LP for "dodging." Its not much but its irritating that its happened twice.
Please tell me whats wrong or can you give me my LP back xD

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like it might be an intermittent connection issue on your end, could you please run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article and let me know if the issue persists.

I'd also recommend [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), just to be sure that it's not your client causing the issues.
